name: Economics and Political Science
notes: a mark of at least 70% in 1.0 POL credit and at least 63% in ECO100Y5, MAT133Y5 (63%)/ MAT134Y5/(MAT132H5,MAT134H5)/ MAT135Y5/(MAT135H5,MAT136H5)/ MAT137Y5 and a minimum Cumulative Grade Point Average of 2.00.
